name: Slimy (MonadoBoy64)
description:
Slimy is a game in where you must avoid objects to stay alive as long as you can and get a high score of how long you stayed alive.

Controls:
Arrow Keys: To Move
Mouse To click buttons
Space Bar: To Pause

I hope you enjoy Slimy and I hope you look forward to my future games!
